item.title: CVE-2023-3701|2024-08-02T07:01:57.365Z -- aqua%20esolutions -- aqua%20drive
item.description: Aqua Drive, in its 2.4 version, is vulnerable to a relative path traversal vulnerability. By exploiting this vulnerability, an authenticated non privileged user could access/modify stored resources of other users. It could also be possible to access and modify the source and configuration files of the cloud disk platform, affecting the integrity and availability of the entire platform.
